description: This file declares the RequestHandler class within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. The class manages lifecycle-related functionalities such as launching, terminating, and updating application states, along with accessing associated handlers and event interfaces.

classes.name: RequestHandler
classes.description: Handles application lifecycle operations including launch, terminate, and state updates, and provides access to component handlers and event interfaces. Implements singleton pattern as indicated by static getInstance method and private constructor.

methods.name: RequestHandler(const RequestHandler& obj) = delete
methods.description: Deletes the copy constructor to prevent copying of the singleton instance.

methods.name: static RequestHandler* getInstance
methods.description: Provides access to the singleton instance of RequestHandler.

methods.name: bool initialize(PluginHost::IShell* service, IEventHandler* eventHandler)
methods.description: Initializes the request handler with service and event handler.

methods.name: void terminate()
methods.description: Terminates or cleans up resources held by the request handler.

methods.name: bool launch(ApplicationContext* context, const string& launchIntent, const Exchange::ILifecycleManager::LifecycleState targetLifecycleState, string& errorReason)
methods.description: Launches an application with specified context and intent, targeting a desired lifecycle state.

methods.name: bool terminate(ApplicationContext* context, bool force, string& errorReason)
methods.description: Terminates an application session, with optional force parameter.

methods.name: bool sendIntent(ApplicationContext* context, const string& intent, string& errorReason)
methods.description: Sends an intent to an application within the given context.

methods.name: bool updateState(ApplicationContext* context, Exchange::ILifecycleManager::LifecycleState targetLifecycleState, string& errorReason)
methods.description: Updates the lifecycle state of an application context.

methods.name: RuntimeManagerHandler* getRuntimeManagerHandler()
methods.description: Returns a pointer to the runtime manager handler.

methods.name: WindowManagerHandler* getWindowManagerHandler()
methods.description: Returns a pointer to the window manager handler.

methods.name: IEventHandler* getEventHandler()
methods.description: Returns a pointer to the event handler.
